column5: Everyone knows what is hidden behind the stash, a smile.
congrats im 3 years in .

Thanks once again boys  Our daughter had invited us out for supper last night...Chemong Lodge in Bridgenorth)....and when we arrived a bunch of our friends were there also for a surprise party.  Fun way to cap off 50 great years.
Awesome Lew!  Surprise parties are the best!
Congrats
Congrats Lew. To use a word much overused these days------that's awesome...it really is!
50 Years is something to be proud of, that's for sure. Congratulations to you Lew and your better half!
Wow what a fantastic milestone Lew, congratulations! Married in your service uniform to boot, a proud moment for sure
Thanks for sharing your celebrations with us Lew and Di, we wouldn't have missed it for the world! It's 42 and counting for us....
Cars last about 10 years, as do most marriages.
I guess. I buy good cars and treat them right.
Congratulations Lew! I can relate to the accomplishment - my wife and celebrated 46 years 3 Oct. I'm a lucky man.
Cars last about 10 years, as do most marriages.  My first marriage lasted 20 years but it seemed a lot longer with the wind chill factor!!!
Congratulations to you & your bride Lew.  Only 15 to go for me & mine  to reach that Milestone
Congrats Lew and your lovely bride. Doesn't surprise me you two have reached this milestone, good people for sure.

I should give a shout out to my Mom and Dad. Celebrated 63 years on September 26th 2016. They have been arguing about how the toilet paper should go on the holder for as long as I have been alive. Petty  arguments may have kept them together for all these years. I have never heard them have an argument over anything serious. We are blessed to have them both with us. I don't have any friends that have both and very few have even one parent to complain about. They are a handful at 89 and 86 but that's something I have that many others don't and wish they did. Dad calls me to remind me the Ti-Cats or the Bills are on TV! He watches both religiously.
Congrats Lew and Dianne! i just saw this tonight, but 50 years is certainly something to be proud of!
Congrats Lew!
Little late here but Congrats Lew!! 50 years is huge milestone. Great pic of the two of you back in the day.

Thanks to all once again, I never thought this post would last so long LOL  And just an update in case anyone is interested, we're 2 weeks into our 2nd half century together and the ole girl is still talking to me so I spose we're still good
.....this beautiful young lady said "I do" and for the last 1/2 century I've been telling her it was the smartest thing she ever did.  It's been a blast and now we're on to the next 50
Congratulations Lew to the both of you, 50 years of anything let alone Marriage is an accomplishment in todays world. Mom and Dad just celebrated 63.  I'm not saying another word.

Congratulations to you & your beautiful bride.  We just celebrated 44 years in August.  I was working in Kashechewan on our anniversary date, so when I returned we enjoyed a feast of Prime rib, 10 oz lobster tails & jumbo shrimp!  Woo Hoo!

Lew and his lovely bride, Congratulations on your long and happy married life together, That is a mile stone for sure in this day and age. Well done and may the future hold much happiness for you both.
Congratulations to both of you!!
Congratulations.  Good folks.  Thanks for your effort in keeping us free.
Congratulations !
Congratulations, that's a long and winding road you've traveled.
Congrats to both of you! Dang you looked young!
Thanks all, the well wishes are much appreciated.  Dang you looked young!  And Paul, 50 years ago I WAS young
Classic Lew smile. Congratulations! Ours is tomorrow. Just twelve for us.
Classic Lew smile.  Some things never change Rob LOL  And congrats to you too on your Anniversary
Congratulations to you both ... Lew you must be doing something right...  Keep it up and you will make the next 50
Congrats Lew, I won't hit that until 2025!
Congratulations kids!! Good Lord Lew, you were young when you got hitched. Good for you. My best to your good lady.
Congratulations Lew and Di...  Mb and I will celebrate 35 years next month...
Some things never change Rob LOL  And congrats to you too on your Anniversary  Thank you. I wondered if it was hidden under the 'stash.... and now we know the rest of the story.
Congrats to you both Lew. 50 years and you still speak of your blushing bride with the highest of regard. You are both blessed and I'm sure the next 50 will be just as good or better.
WOW,  Congrats you two. You made a great CUTE couple,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,   And still do

That sure is a beautiful picture Lew, have you ever thought about getting it put on to canvas? Congratulations my friend,now how about sharing your secret to such a long and wonderful marriage with all the young ones on here
WHAT IS THE SECRET OR SECRET TO KEEP IT GOING FOR 50 YEARS?!  MY CAR DOESNT EVEN LAST MORE THAN 10 YEARS!
Congratulations folks.   Here's to many, many more.
Great picture and congratulations to the 2 of you. I am only on lucky 13
congrats!!!  50 years wow..
congrats Lew, what a milestone. Steph & I celebrated 25 on Wednesday. May we be fortunate enough to see another as you have.
